siteInfoSection.textSignUp: Sign up and start studying today
siteInfoSection.subTittleInfo: We have a certificate confirming the implementation and use of a quality management system consistent with the requirements of the TGLS Quality Alliance Quality Mark.
siteInfoSection.textInfo: Offer of stationary or distance courses in time (online) at all available on the Internet; general language courses for teenagers and adults, as well as business and industry courses. We allow you to obtain international certificates and public examinations. We conduct classes in small, intimate groups of 2, 3-5 people or sick people. We adapt to the client's needs, hence the possibility of studying during the weekend.

answerOne.textAnswers: Our online English lessons take place on the JustSchool interactive platform. Here you can communicate with the teacher in real time and perform interesting interactive tasks.

answerTwo.textAnswers: Our course includes video lessons, practical tasks, testing and the opportunity to receive feedback from teachers.

answerThree.headerAnswer: What approaches are used in training?
answerThree.textAnswers: We use a variety of methods and approaches, such as the communicative method, game techniques and an individual approach to each student.

answerFour.headerAnswer: What are the advantages of distance learning?
answerFour.textAnswers: Remote learning gives you the opportunity to study conveniently from anywhere and at your own pace, with efficient use of time.
